item.title: Arch_commands
item.description: some commands on arch journalctl -b -1 -r that will display the logs for your last boot (-b -1), starting at the last messages in the log (-r) shutdown shutdown -r #重启计算机（和reboot）命令一样 shutdown -h #关闭计算机并关闭电源（常用） shutdown -f #

item.title: Arch 安装
item.description: 使用Arch总结 reinstall record 参照官方教程时的注意点 1，网络设置环节 2，怎么分区 3，分区规划及设置 my partition strategy Device Size Type Mount Point /dev/sda1 1G EFI System /boot /dev/sda2 50G Linux filesystem / /dev/sda3 50G Linux filesystem /home /dev/sda4 10G Linux
